role.argrole: divided among/between, if separate from arg1

example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_3MS هو)) (NP-PRD (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_NOM جزء) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM اساسي)) (SBAR (WHNP-4 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يتجزأ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-4)))))) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN مساهمات) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_GEN الكويت))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN العديدة))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN مقاومة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاحتلال) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الاسرائيلي)))))))
